use.flag: Adds support for Kinect-like 3D sensors devices with dev-libs/OpenNI.
Adds support for Kinect-like 3D sensors devices with dev-libs/OpenNI2 (should be preferred over openni).

pkgmetadata.longdescription: The Point Cloud Library (PCL) is a standalone, large scale, open project for 2D/3D image and point cloud processing.
